Charles H Tillson of the City and County of St Louis. State of Missouri being by me duly sworn. on his oath says that he will "well and truly execute and perform all the duties of his Station" as a Commissioner of Deeds &c for Kentucky. within the State of Missouri
Subscribed and sworn to before me this 10th day of March AD 1862. as witness my hand & official seal

S. Perit Rawles
